passage.title: The Wilson family have a good vacation
passage.paragraph: This year Lisa Wilson and her family visit London, England. They have fun. They go to many interesting places. They go to museums and many famous buildings. Lisa is most interested in the Egypt Room of the British Museum. Her father taks many pictures there. Lisa's mother goes shopping in the gift shop.
Then, Lisa's family go to France by train. England is on an island, so the train travels under the water to France! It is exciting. The Wilson family have a good vacation.
